metadata.title: CVE-2023-31794 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
MuPDF v1.21.1 was discovered to contain an infinite recursion in thecomponent pdf_mark_list_push. This vulnerability allows attackers to causea Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted PDF file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-31794` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.22.2+ds1-2
mupdf-tools - 1.22.2+ds1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.22.2+ds1-2').
